001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.dsl.js;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.BitcoinNetwork;
004import org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.BitcoinExtendedClient;
005import org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.RpcConfig;
006import org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.RpcURI;
007import org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.test.TestServers;
008import org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.test.RegTestEnvironment;
009import org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.test.RegTestFundingSource;
010import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.AsyncSupport;
011import org.openjdk.nashorn.api.scripting.NashornScriptEngineFactory;
012import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
013import org.slf4j.Logger;
014import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
015
016import javax.script.ScriptEngine;
017import javax.script.ScriptException;
018import java.io.File;
019import java.io.FileInputStream;
020import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
021import java.io.InputStreamReader;
022import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
023import java.util.function.BiFunction;
024import java.util.function.Function;
025
026
027/**
028 * ScriptRunner that places a JSON-RPC client and Bitcoin utility functions inside
029 * a script context so they can be called from JavaScript (currently Nashorn, but in
030 * the future this may be Graal Javascript)
031 */
032public class ScriptRunner {
033    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ScriptRunner.class);
034    private final ScriptEngine engine;
035
036    public ScriptRunner(RpcConfig rpcConfig) {
037        engine = new NashornScriptEngineFactory().getScriptEngine("-scripting");
038        var client = new BitcoinExtendedClient(rpcConfig);
039        var env = new RegTestEnvironment(client);
040        var funder = new RegTestFundingSource(client);
041        engine.put("client", client);
042        engine.put("env", env);
043        engine.put("funder", funder);
044        engine.put("satoshi", (Function<Number, Coin>) satoshis -> Coin.valueOf(satoshis.longValue()));
045        engine.put("btc", (Function<Number, Coin>) btc -> Coin.valueOf(btc.longValue() * Coin.COIN.longValue()));
046        engine.put("coin", (BiFunction<Number, Number, Coin>) (btc, cents) -> Coin.valueOf(btc.intValue(), cents.intValue()));
047        engine.put("getBlockCount", (AsyncSupport.ThrowingSupplier<Integer>) client::getBlockCount);
048    }
049
050    public ScriptRunner() {
051        this(new RpcConfig(BitcoinNetwork.MAINNET, RpcURI.getDefaultMainNetURI(),
052                TestServers.getInstance().getRpcTestUser(), TestServers.getInstance().getRpcTestPassword()));
053    }
054
055    public Object evalResource(String resourcePath) throws ScriptException {
056        log.info("Running resource: {}", resourcePath);
057        var reader = new InputStreamReader(getClass().getResourceAsStream(resourcePath), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
058        return engine.eval(reader);
059    }
060
061    public Object evalFile(File scriptFile) throws ScriptException, FileNotFoundException {
062        log.info("Running file: {}", scriptFile);
063        var reader = new InputStreamReader(new FileInputStream(scriptFile), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
064        return engine.eval(reader);
065    }
066}
